system.description:
Time: 25−RSI Seconds+Ritual: Song
Range: Self/Touch+Duration: RSI minutes

An invocation to produce battle frenzy in a cleric’s allies. They have a double move for Duration, but must select the most aggressive option for Attack or Defense with +10 on all combat skills. Each subject is assessed F3 Fatigue at end of Duration.

CS: fatigue is ignored.

CF: the invoker (alone) goes Berserk.
